sql:
SELECT COUNT(*)
FROM title t, movie_companies mc, cast_info ci
WHERE t.id = mc.movie_id AND t.id = ci.movie_id AND t.production_year  =  1982 AND mc.company_id  <  708 AND mc.company_type_id  =  2 AND ci.person_id  <  2040242 AND ci.role_id  =  1
